page.title: 10Entertainment
page.content: TNT: TNT is a mini theatre organisation for children, who have to audition to be a member. It is run twice weekly in Newport in a large hall with a stage. They put on shows for the local people to come and see. The group has been running for over four years now and puts on two plays each year which are very well attended. There is also a dancing class for children in Wormit. It is held in a small local hall on a Saturday morning. There are three different meetings for different age groups but all combine yearly to put on a dancing and singing production which again is very well supported.
